class.name: ClassDB
class.description: Provides access to metadata stored for every available class.

method.name: can_instance
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if you can instance objects from the specified [code]class[/code], [code]false[/code] in other case.

method.name: class_exists
method.description: Returns whether the specified [code]class[/code] is available or not.

method.name: class_get_category
method.description: Returns a category associated with the class for use in documentation and the Asset Library. Debug mode required.

method.name: class_get_enum_constants
method.description: Returns an array with all the keys in [code]enum[/code] of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_enum_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the enums of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant
method.description: Returns the value of the integer constant [code]name[/code] of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry. Always returns 0 when the constant could not be found.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant_enum
method.description: Returns which enum the integer constant [code]name[/code] of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry belongs to.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant_list
method.description: Returns an array with the names all the integer constants of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_method_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the methods of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry if [code]no_inheritance[/code] is [code]false[/code]. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary] with the following keys: [code]args[/code], [code]default_args[/code], [code]flags[/code], [code]id[/code], [code]name[/code], [code]return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage)[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] In exported release builds the debug info is not available, so the returned dictionaries will contain only method names.

method.name: class_get_property
method.description: Returns the value of [code]property[/code] of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_property_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the properties of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry if [code]no_inheritance[/code] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: class_get_signal
method.description: Returns the [code]signal[/code] data of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry. The returned value is a [Dictionary] with the following keys: [code]args[/code], [code]default_args[/code], [code]flags[/code], [code]id[/code], [code]name[/code], [code]return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage)[/code].

method.name: class_get_signal_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the signals of [code]class[/code] or its ancestry if [code]no_inheritance[/code] is [code]false[/code]. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary] as described in [method class_get_signal].

method.name: class_has_enum
method.description: Returns whether [code]class[/code] or its ancestry has an enum called [code]name[/code] or not.

method.name: class_has_integer_constant
method.description: Returns whether [code]class[/code] or its ancestry has an integer constant called [code]name[/code] or not.

method.name: class_has_method
method.description: Returns whether [code]class[/code] (or its ancestry if [code]no_inheritance[/code] is [code]false[/code]) has a method called [code]method[/code] or not.

method.name: class_has_signal
method.description: Returns whether [code]class[/code] or its ancestry has a signal called [code]signal[/code] or not.

method.name: class_set_property
method.description: Sets [code]property[/code] value of [code]class[/code] to [code]value[/code].

method.name: get_class_list
method.description: Returns the names of all the classes available.

method.name: get_inheriters_from_class
method.description: Returns the names of all the classes that directly or indirectly inherit from [code]class[/code].

method.name: get_parent_class
method.description: Returns the parent class of [code]class[/code].

method.name: instance
method.description: Creates an instance of [code]class[/code].

method.name: is_class_enabled
method.description: Returns whether this [code]class[/code] is enabled or not.

method.name: is_parent_class
method.description: Returns whether [code]inherits[/code] is an ancestor of [code]class[/code] or not.
